title: Ngai teh nunna tui thisen hlu
lyrics:
Ngai teh, nunna tui thisen hlu,
Tunah a luang mek e;
Chu lui Chhandamtu thisen chu,
Vur anga varna chu. (2)

Vur anga varnaah chuan inbual la,
Tu pawh a inbual duh apiang
Sualte a tleng fai ang.

Chhandamtu'n Kalvari tlangah,
Lungngai taka tuarin;
Chutin thisen ropui a chhuak,
Vur anga varna chu. (2)

Aw, kan vaiin kan kal thei ang,
Chu thisen luiah chuan;
Thisen ropui chauh chu ringin,
Vur anga varna chu. (2)

Lalpa chu a lo hunah,
A mite a hruai ang,
Chu thisen ringtute chauh chuan
Vanram chu an chang ang. (2)
